website_summaries.verdict: A 50 A non-touch pilot arc plasma cutter that is capable of a 1/2-inch maximum clean cut and a 3/4-inch maximum severance cut.
pros: Lotos Technology's non-touch pilot arc allows its plasma cutter to cut through rough, rusty, and painted surfaces while producing a minimum of slag
This compact unit has a convenient transport handle and uses compressed air as a medium
cons: This plasma cutter has a tendency to burn through the consumables at a fast clip
Consider purchasing extra to be prepared

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, well worth it
customer_reviews.text: From reading lots of reviews I gathered that if it’s not DOA then these were okay and buying from Amazon would keep you from being stuck with a defective one. I pulled the trigger and bought one. I’m a long time user of big name plasma cutters, and am really pleased with this one. Note that on eBay you can get a stamped steel torch stand-off just like Hypertherm’s that is way better than the wire kind it comes with. I’ve done a couple projects with up to 1/2” plate and am on my first set of consumables still. If you’re on the fence, I recommend going for it-you won’t regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later and still running strong! Paid for itself in less than one job!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I am an actual person and not paid advertisement. I bout this little guy and it paid for itself 3x over on one job. See the pictures... It cut conex boxes apart like a hot knife through butter on 220v. UPDATE: 2 years later and this plasma cutter is still kicking a$$. Even though i posted pictures of it cutting through Connex boxes with ease, it also has no issues making quick work of 1/2 inch thick steel I-beams. It does everything from massive industrial structures to fine art! Don’t believe me? Check out what this little box has done for my business. Www.facebook.com/barrelhousemetalandwoodworks
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I've used the torch for a little over two years, probably an hour of time on the machine total. Today the torch and ground clamp both failed. I'm guessing the failures are related, but I've never seen anything like it. Ive taken the cup off to show the torch damage in the picture above. The ground clamp was always astoundingly short on this tool and the regulator that came with it always has leaked. I would not recommend this product to anyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: racerboy

customer_reviews.title: The second unit failed within a month and now I am out of the return period so basically wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one of these several months ago. It worked for about an hour and then the pilot arch stopped igniting consistently. I contacted amazon and they replaced it for free. The second unit failed within a month and now I am out of the return period so basically wasted my money. I had a very similar failure on the second unit (pilot would ignite but it wouldn't cut). Don't buy this unless you like buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: V. L. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this plasma cutter on 12-5-2017 and it does not work. Got a new torch for it and it still does not work. Lotus is not working with me to get it replaced or returned. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SueBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great home/ hobby cutter!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great home shop cutter!!! Cut 3/8 mild steel like butter!!!! Only down side is that the consumables are a little, well alot more expensive for this model!!! In time hopefully they will be in line with the older models????? For the money you can't go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Allen I.

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting machine.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing. I was leery of how well it would work considering the price, but it really works very well. It will cut 1/2 inch material cleanly and is very good on consumables. Great for cutting out damaged or rusty body panels. Anyone that uses a torch will probably like this better. Wish I had gotten one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Bulky

customer_reviews.title: you can gouge just fine with one of these units as well
customer_reviews.text: This is no hypertherm unit... but a hypertherm costs 10 times as much. With a little creativity and know-how, you can gouge just fine with one of these units as well... which for anyone in the repair business, THAT is what plasmas are good for, not just making clean cuts on new material. You absolutely can not beat the value. Price vs quality is just amazing. Again, this is not a professional unit, so you can't treat it like one. But for the non-production user, this little thing will do any and everything you would like it to do. I was skeptical before purchasing, but super glad i took the chance on it. Very impressed. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ed mcmahon

customer_reviews.title: Intermittent Pilot Arc
customer_reviews.text: When the pilot arc works, it performs we'll. I purchased it in 2012 and have used it about 10 times. It worked great the first 2 or 3 times but then the pilot arc became more and more intermittent. Each time I use it, I put in a new ignitor tip and nozzle and it usually takes 30 to 60 minutes of fiddling around to get the arc working. For a 2 minute cut, it takes up to an hour to get the arc going. Today I blew a gasket - it's now awaiting trash pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J. Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Garbage....stay away....junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit....it does not work.....total junk! Only a 30 day replacement warranty....I should have know then it was crap. Now I have to pay shipping both ways to get a new unit fixed after owning less than 2months. Pay attention to reviews and stay away from this item!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K Anderson

customer_reviews.title: One year review.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use it plenty long before I wrote this. Had it for about a year now, without any problems. It cuts tool steele without any problems. In fact it has easily cut everything that Ive put it to. It definitely slows down when I hook it up on 110, but still cuts nice. My only complaints are that the air hose it came with is really crappy.. I replaced it on day one. Also it does eat consumables like a fat kid on Halloween. Their pretty cheap so its not a big deal to buy a big bag of them. My uncle was so impressed using mine, he bought one himself. He loves his too.
customer_reviews.author: Rooster

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first day or two. But then the pilot arch was inconsistent and it used a lot of consumables. I didn't use it for a few months and tried again. Inconsistent again until final it won't start an arch at all. The air comes on when I pull the trigger and I can see the pilot arch spark but will not make an arch to cut. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and then had issues, but LOTOS saved the day
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this and used it a few times without issue, and then it had stopped. Because I work overseas for extended periods of time, I was not able to return the item through amazon in time. I called and emailed LOTOS with the issue I was having, and they responded very quickly to help me out. They gave me some basic troubleshooting steps to verify a few things for them. Afterward, they honored their warranty on the LOTOS and sent me a new one. I have been very impressed by Lotos's customer service, and the machine has been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: because the air gauge leaks really bad as well
customer_reviews.text: After reading and getting on line, and calling Lotos tech for further instructions..... This machine fails to cut... I feel that it was never check out before it was sent out... because the air gauge leaks really bad as well...This has waisted my time.. Wish I had good news ...but Sorry it has to be sent back....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not cut as well as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this purchase. A relatively inexpensive machine that would cut up to 1/2" steel! Well it won't. At least not for me. I work a lot with 1/8 to 1/4 steel (mild) which should have been easy for this machine. It was not. In fact, when I cut 1/8" material I had to go back with a cutoff blade and finish the cut. Not worth the cost even though it's low. Good that I could return through Amazon. Not good that I bought a bunch of consumables that I'll end up throwing.
customer_reviews.author: Dave T

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous generation and it lasted six years. This one gave up day two. It worked "ok" but sloppier than my previous Lotos. Also, it seems finding consumables that fit is a nightmare so its probably for the best it failed early.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Heagarty

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well. I have been impressed so far by this thing. Who knows how long it's going to work for but for now it has worked flawlessly and worked well. I have cut some 1/4" stainless with it and it was not that pretty of a cut but it did the job with acceptable results. I have no idea how efficient it will be on consumables so maybe not for a shop but for a home gamer? This all coming from a guy that has only otherwise used Hypertherm plasma cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Low life expectancy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this several years ago, used it several times, quality of cut was low. Overall cut maybe 10 ft. Went to use it again yesterday, and its dead, turns on hums and everything, but no arc, no cut nothing. Took off the cover, no internal fuses, no apparent damage. Put new tip assembly on, still nothing. The instructions that come with the machine are a joke, a folded half sheet of copy paper, with hardly any info. Good luck and be forwarned!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit and excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Im a hobbyist so i only use this on occasion but its been a great little unit. Make very nice cuts and you really cant beat the price. I had a problem with my unit and contacted customer service. They were very responsive and resolved my issue with a few days. Definitely a game changer when it comes to metal work or for automotive application. Im not burning through cutting wheels anymore. The non touch pilot arc is also a must have feature. Consumables are cheap and so far it has cut anything i throw at it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: This is THE Plasma cutter to have BUY IT !!
customer_reviews.text: I added the Lotos LTP5000D to my welding cart and now it's complete. I personally tested this hard, I completely cut into pieces a Civic. The (no ground) pilot just burns paint, or other light non metal interferences. I used it in 115VAC mode using the optional power adapter cord at about 20Amps. I clogged/burnt two tips but it comes w/ three additional. I also got the tip pack which (as a homeowner) I suspect will last me a couple years. A nice bonus is the built in air regulator and water filter. This unit is capable of cutting through 1/2" no problem.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Wont cut advertised thickness
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price. wont cut 3/8" steel to save its live. air pressure was good. 50 amp plug. just would not cut it. ended up going back to my band saw. kind of disappointed. outside of return window. cuts sheet metal pretty good and clean but absolutely impossible to do anything over 1/4"
customer_reviews.author: aussompossum

customer_reviews.title: Got a deal on black Friday only paid $322.
customer_reviews.text: It would of been a five star if the box wasn't damaged through shipping. Top edge of box was gouged in with clear tape covering it. Pulled out the machine and found side panel vent louvers pushed in about 1/4" in and the panel it's self pushed in about 1/4" also. Tested the machine and it works just fine. Decided to keep it. Will be adding a longer grounding cable. Why do they use short grounding cables? They should be as long as the main work cable. But it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Every single cut ruins the consumables
customer_reviews.text: I cannot make this plasma cutter work correctly. After I stop the cut the cutter keeps arcing and then makes the tip get red hot and melt/fuse. What am I doing wrong? Happy to increase the review if my problems can be solved. This cut was done with 26 amps / 70 psi in about 14 gauge sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: they were extremely helpful in getting my problems resolved to the point I now have a good working unit
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a well designed product. However, the third time I used it, it failed to operate. Customer service has been helpful in trying to resolve the problem. I have conducted several tests on the unit based on their suggestions and replaced one part but still do not have a resolution. Working with their product support personnel, they were extremely helpful in getting my problems resolved to the point I now have a good working unit. It is performing as I had expected. It would purchase another one if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome, uses o ring air fitting.
customer_reviews.text: Machine works awesome, cuts aluminum without a problem. Only issue is a personal preference one. If you use the long tip air connectors they are a straight thread with o ring, I just made an adapter and works fine but just an fyi so you have something on hand when it arrives. Great product, very much worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over 1 year of use and still working perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on buying this plasma cutter, and I am glad I did. Looks great, works great, and is easy to use. This is my first plasma cutter. I have used it at least a dozen times now to cut thick wire mesh, pipe, sheet metal, and square stock. Cuts everything perfectly. The thickest stuff I have cut through so far is 1/4 inch, and it did that as easily as cutting through thin sheet metal. You cannot beat the price for this plasma cutter! I use this in my personal garage alongside my aluminum welder, mig welder, and stick welder for automotive, tractor, and hobby use.
customer_reviews.author: RobbyB

customer_reviews.title: This little machine is great!
customer_reviews.text: The best bang for the buck out there! I have used this so much in the past year. It's not bad on consumables if you pay attention to what your doing. I have gotten lazy and dipped the tip a time or two. The guide which came with it is junk and I burnt it in half the very first time I used it. I cut a lot of thin rusty sheet metal while restoring an old Bronco. It cut it with no problems. My latest project is building new horse stalls. I'm using 2 3/8 oil field pipe with 1/4 wall. It's old, used, rusty and dirty but this Lotos will cut and notch it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I originally received a machine that was glitchy, the arc started hard and the overheat light kept coming on and would not go out until a shutdown and restart. It took me 30 days to finally make myself sit down and contact customer service at which point I was immediately given a shipping label for return and subsequent replacement. The replacement arrived today and I am very pleased with its functionality. It worked flawlessly out of the box. My customer service experience could not have been easier or more efficient, top notch. I cannot give the cutter 5 stars because the first machine was faulty but since that point on I have had a 5 star experience. Gary
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Air connection solution
customer_reviews.text: Bought for DIY hobby projects around the house. I have zero experience w/ plasma cutters so will leave that to others. I'm writing to show a solution for air hookup w/out having to remove the cutter from a welding cart. Solved using a 3/8" rubber whip w/ 360 degree swivel connection ( all available on Amazon). See Images. Lotos is on bottom w/extra brackets installed for ground and torch cables. Its a crowded setup complete w/14" chop saw on back.
customer_reviews.author: Mainer

customer_reviews.title: Wow cheep don't mean cheap on this unit profromance wise,
customer_reviews.text: First and I'll keep it snug ,for money unit comperabble to 1500$ plus units as to cut quality consistency Very Good, it is small and light I have used it on a lot of different Guage/size and a verity of metals and I'm very happy with cut quality I only tested on 220ACV so can't speak for 110ACV profromance ,I hope it lasts a few years if so I will buy again thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Z

customer_reviews.title: Works great. But
customer_reviews.text: Works great. But, don't try to run it off a generator. The immediate current needs of the plasma cutter cannot be met by a generator. By that I mean, the plasma cutter could go from drawing 10amps to 20amps immediately and the gas generator's governor just can't kick in fast enough to supply the needed power. With the generator I found my cutter kicking in and out every 1/4 second. When I then hooked it up to a real 220 outlet it worked just fine. The generator was rated at 20 amps which should be enough for the cutter, but it just couldn't respond fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Great Plasma Cutter
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived finally. After I contacted them to see where it was, it arrived the next day. Plasma Cutter was well packaged and just as described. Easy to use straight out of the box. I did make a longer extension cord and run it off 220V in my shop. The pilot arc is a great feature, the unit is very light. The torch cord is long enough, it would be nice to have a longer ground cord. If you have been wanting a plasma cutter, like I had for a long time, go ahead and purchase this one. You will not be disappointed. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: William T Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great customer from Lotos
customer_reviews.text: Lotos ltp5000d is a very good plasma cutter for under $500 dollars The customer service in Santa Clara Ca is great I never owned a plasma cutter before and had questions to ask customer service and lotos representative very knowledgeable about the machine and answered all my questions and very patient with me also sent me a storage bag for my wand at no charge I would highly recommend buying your plasma cutter thru Amazon 2 day delivery and get GREAT customer service from Lotos that comes along with your machine service
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellant Product
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a plasma cutter before so this was a first for me. After making a plug for my 240V receptacle and hooking everything up, I was ready for a trial run. I used a scrap 3/8 in mild steel as a test piece, I used a piece of angle for a straight edge. The cut was clean and straight. The least expensive USA made machine for 1/2 in cuts were over $1,200.00. The Lotos is not a production plasma cutter but will work great for the average home welder. When this one quits I'll purchase another. I would recommend this product. If you shop around you can get consumables at lower prices that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Can't find consumables!
customer_reviews.text: The unit works great & I have had some time on it. The biggest problem I have is that twice I have ordered consumables that say they fit the cutter & twice I have had to return them because they did not. If I need a new tip at this point I'm screwed. The items on the left with the course thread will not fit, even though ALL of the product descriptions say it does. The tips on the right have the correct fine thread and will fit. Where do I get these?
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ensing

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This product works even better than I thought it would. I am very happy with it for the price. It was easy to set up and use out of the box. I read through the manual before using it to familiarize myself with it and it works great. I also bought the pigtail adapter for it since I didn't have an outlet with the correct receptacle for the plug on the unit. I have it plugged into 120V currently and it works like a champ. Very happy camper here!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Tiny monster
customer_reviews.text: Incredible little machine. It's like a micro light saber. I've used a thermal dynamics cutter before that costs five times as much. This tiny Lotos performs nearly as well for 1/5 the cost! Cuts right through rusty painted metal. Make sure you have a good ground. Grind off any paint or rust from where you clamp your ground. Clean the tip of the gun with a wire brush often for best performance. Use it on 220v and be amazed!
customer_reviews.author: fireysoul

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, clear and explicit directions as to use and maintenance. using 220 volt its cut everything I have tried it on, a little pricier than some models but this works just fine. Cut some 20 ga. plating makes a very thin and precise line, and once I got the heat adjusted right very little splash and burr left.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: we have used the plasma cutter to build a bumper and it was great! we would recommend this to anyone, a novice like me or someone that has used one for years. we had a issue with it the first time I used it but customer service called me right back and took care of us. we are more then satisfied with this company and highly recommend them. thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Perez

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been fabricating with metal since I was 14. I was a skilled trades welder at GM for 40 years and have an active home shop. I’m 71 now and this cutter is fantastic. Heat transfer and warpage are nonexistent, speed and start time are fast with very little slag. Not to mention the ability to cut nonferrous metals. Time will answer the questions concerning reliability and abilities of this machine. Called Lotos and found out that for 30 days after purchase you can get consumables and accessories for 20% off, but so far consumables are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a lightning deal and has been great for money!!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for everything I need it for, granted I'm not trying to cut half inch steel plate, it may be able to do it but I doubt it from what I've experienced. If you are a hobbyist this is probably the one for you, if your an industrial laborer and plan to work this thing 10+ hrs a day probably not your cup of tea. PS I'm not sure if the threading for the tips is universal but the off-brand bulk packs on here work just fine
customer_reviews.author: Nibblekibble

customer_reviews.title: poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: this product worked fine for about 30 days and now won't even strike an arc, we have contacted Lotos and they have sent us a trouble shooting chart. we have done everything pertinent on that chart and it still doesn't work. we have called them two more times to see what to do next and still haven't heard anything from them. Hoping they read their reviews, because it was a great machine when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet machine. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I used the reviews as a gauge for buying this product. Just before buying it i saw some thought the reviews were fake... Let me tell you.. This machine is exactly as described by all positive reviews!! It works awesome and the only reason i have it 4 stars was because they charge 50$ for the 110v pigtail... Otherwise its sweet and cuts quick and clean. Would buy again and suggest friends do too. Check my picture sliced through a 4ft wide piece of 1/8" steel like nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Once I got my shop configured it cut on the first start. Now has cut structural and decorative steel. A little learning involved but good to go. Will try SS and Alum soon. Not quite as powerful as the commercial models (at 10 times the money) but works at the ranch.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the $$$...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine for the money. As previous reviewers suggested, I ran this thing for about an hour when I first got it to make sure it worked out of the box. A month later, I used it to cut up an old truck cab, truck bed,and some scrap steel for a haul away and this thing held up to the challenge. About 800lbs of scrap cut into manageable pieces running 110V input and the machine impressed me. Probably not so great for ornamental stuff, but for doing rough cuts for finishing parts and pieces, this is your machine at $1k under the competition. My only complaint is the ground clamp, but I'll upgrade that shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Cutter like butter
customer_reviews.text: Cuts like butter. I love this cutter. Comes with everything you need and then some. Extra consumables and a bag to hold them in. Out of the box it had the air intake assembled and connected so it was all plug and play. For the money so far it’s a huge saving on grind cutting!!! Do not hesitate on this purchase if you are doing at home, art or repair. This should be in every shop that cuts metal without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, you can't beat the cutter. Tech services/support is exceptional! Responds immediately to emails. Don't know what else you can expect. Quality cut, easy to use .... buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive plasma cutter!
customer_reviews.text: For the hobbyist this is a great machine for the money. Cuts through steel like a hot knife thru butter. Recommend running a 220/240v 50 amp circuit to supply this machine, as it will cut on 110/120v but not nearly as well or on as thick of metal as 220/240v.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Pask

customer_reviews.title: Great for price. Cuts well for hobby use.
customer_reviews.text: Have used it around 40 hours with no problem. 1/4 to 5/16 metal is an easy cut. I cut a 1/2 inch thick 20 inch dia pipe for a fire box. It left alot of slag and used 6 tips to do a 24 inch by 24 inch door. Have only used it in 220 v mode.
customer_reviews.author: Ed C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality At An Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for my building requirements. I have been using the LTP5000D for just over 5 months. I am still using the original tip. It takes a bit of getting used to however, it has exceeded my requirements. However it has one major flaw. It makes my garage door open.Today I cut 4 foot of 3/16 plate for my project. It all went smoothly except for my garage door. Plays hell with my fluorescent lights also.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Hammarstrom

customer_reviews.title: ... have used several plasma torches and this is the worst one yet
customer_reviews.text: i have used several plasma torches and this is the worst one yet. i cut 3/16" plate and this machine was barley able to make a clean cut.DON'T wast your money. by the time i got to use the machine my 30 days had lapsed otherwise i would of sent it back. i am stuck with it. oh well maybe i can save someone else..
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Pilot arc won’t work
customer_reviews.text: Update: the pilot worked off and on for the first week and it hasn’t worked since. No reply from customer service. Works great when the pilot arc fires
customer_reviews.author: Nathan P.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you customer support
customer_reviews.text: After a year I had an issue with my machine not pilot lighting. I have to say I was a little hesitant that the company would not care, but in fact one phone call and 3 days later I had a brand new machine at my door. Customer support was amazing. Definitely recommend this product if you're looking for a cost effective plasma cutter. The machine works very well no other complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good unit great price.
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of reviews on amazon for this product. Being a home shop and not a production shop I opted to gamble on this cheaper plasma cutter over a more expensive unit. So far this unit has performed well. I have only used it a little but it has done anything I want. It was shipped with a stupid plug that is not common to any outlet I've ever seen, I just cut it off and wired on a 220-V plug and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: She works. I've cut through 1/2" plate for a while with this. After 2 months, no problems. The torch to part spacer was the only issue, but I think they've fixed this now. Anything over 50amps might be hard to find a plug for on 120, so I wired this in parallel with my 220v ac mig welder. Home depot supplies the heavy duty long cord sold by the foot you might need, or you can use an old dryer plug in cord if you don't mind it being so short. The supplied cord is a few feet already.
customer_reviews.author: Metatron7

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I like this product based upon price. After receiving this product I spent about 10 minutes setting it up. I tried cutting thin and thick gauge metal with no issues. Has a nice gun and after each use I checked tip which showed only usual signs of wear. I think a lot of bad reviews may be from a dud machine but most likely from folks that do not know how to use a plasma cutter properly. I did research before buying. I even called numerous places that did repairs on plasma and other welding equipment that also said most issues seen with these low priced machines is from consumer not knowing how to use it properly.
customer_reviews.author: michsel

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Machine
customer_reviews.text: Great Little Machine. I bought this machine a little over a year ago, and I haven't had any problems. I hooked it up on 220 and it works great. I cut mainly 1/8 to 1/4 inch stuff. My wife uses it to cut out designs for yard art in old shovels, flat metal and so on. She can use this like a pencil when drawing out designs. I, on the other hand, am a lot slower. For the money, this is a great buy for the home hobbyist. The only reason for not giving 5 stars is that Nothing is perfect. Like I said, It is a great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Milholen

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a little powerhouse. Only used a few times and I am still working on the best settings. For the price so far you can't beat this unit. Just used on 120 volt so far and it will trip a standard breaker if the cut is very long going to wire up for 240 volt soon .
customer_reviews.author: Pat J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Cuts better with 220 but cuts great with ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Cuts better with 220 but cuts great with 110 as well surprised on how thick it cuts for the price and the quality of the cuts.The hose clamps arent too tight but use some pipe tape to seal them easy stuff. This is one of the most useful tools ever for me at least. i wish the grounding cable was as long as the leads to the gun it would make more sense as you have to have the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Colton P.

customer_reviews.title: Good machine bad accessories.
customer_reviews.text: The plasma cutter does work well but they cut corners on the accessories. All of the air fittings are low quality and leak badly. My main concern is that the torch lead is NOT heat resistant and will melt through if it comes in contact with hot metal. This happened to me the second time I went to use the plasma cutter. No air would make it to the torch head because the torch lead had already formed an air leak.
customer_reviews.author: TheMavericScientist

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, had worked in the trades with plasma cutters in the past and read some reviews that were negative on this cutter after I ordered it but it works great. I ordered the 220 plug for it and use it with 220. I haven't tried it on 110. It has made fabricating things so much faster than with cutoff wheels, hack saws, and saws-alls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job - I Like It
customer_reviews.text: I have used it several times. Cut 1/2” steel about as good as my icy/accy torch. Cuts 1/8” steel but it took some playing with air pressure and amps to get a reasonably clean line. This doesn’t cut like a high end cutter but it doesn’t cost much either. Overall I’m pleased. Btw- I’ve only used it on 220V.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Eason

customer_reviews.title: Jeep Project
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a few times but it cut through some 1/8 mild steel right off the bat! I bought it to help me with a Jeep rust project that I need to cut off part of the frame to put on some Safety Caps. As of now, no issues running it off 110 and a 20 amp breaker. If it does good after my project, I’ll come back and add a star.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great unit and customer support
customer_reviews.text: I bough this unit in June. in September It stopped working. I called lotos support and told them the problem. They review the issue and a week later I had a new unit. Great customer service I wish more businesses are like this. As for the use of the plasma cutter the unit is great. I use 220v to make sure the unit uses it full potential. the cuts are clean, narrow and fast. For the price it’s great for my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Christen English

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks
customer_reviews.text: Cut off my spring perches like butter, works really well. I ordered the wrong extra consumables and customer service took care of me very quickly!! I paid the extra money as opposed to a cheaper cut 50 and definitely got my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: paulhead

customer_reviews.title: can't beat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Performs as well as a top name brand unit at a fraction of the cost. Easily cuts through 1/2" thick materials. I've already had the wire ring that goes on the end get destroyed. Don't really need that though, and it's easier to guide without it. I had a friend, that's a welder by trade, check it out. He was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! But your wife will hate the smell and the fuses you will keep blowing...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a couple of years, just around the garage for projects, repairs and such. I've ran it on 220 and 110 & even the 110 does decent on thin sheet metal. My 5hp 20gal compressor can just keep up...really need something bigger, but it works. Ceramic cups suck, but if u take off the pilot arc wire, they last much longer. For the price, I couldn't be happier. Awesome product at a good price. HELLO MILLER!!! Hobby guys like us don' t want to pay THOUSANDS for stuff like this, ESPECIALLY guys just getting into plasma cutting!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: After experiencing the issue I learned that several other people have experienced it as well.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and purchase this plasma cutter. I unboxed it and everything went together very easily. However, when I plugged it in and was preparing to use it it did not function correctly. I was getting air pressure out of the nozzle however it would not cut. The only thing that I experience was a very small ark and air pressure through the gun. I returned and I am in the process of waiting to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: a couple months in and and this cutter kicks butt. what a great price for a good machine so far. I make most of my own custom jeep parts and im loving this machine. great power and clean cuts
customer_reviews.author: The D Family

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was leary of purchasing a Chinese brand, but the others are just ridiculously priced. I read lots a great reviews on Lotos brand, and they can be repaired locally, so I took the jump. I wanted a pilot arc because I plan on building a CNC router cutter table someday. I received the cutter and picked up the required plug end at Home Depot. I was kind of shocked at how well this guy cuts 3/16th steel on 110v at 60psi/3.5CFM. Haven't used my cutting torch since...
customer_reviews.author: Scott (Technogeek)Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cutter. It was very easy to setup. Nice quality. Does Exactly what it says. Very happy with this purchase. It cuts angle iron like butter. I have used this for work on Trailers and building winch mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James Garvin

customer_reviews.title: Great machine after ground clamp replaced.
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using this a few weeks ago it was great at times and other times had issues blowing through material thickness that it should have no issue with. After reading other reviews I replaced the ground clamp with a high quality one from a welding supply store and now it cuts awesome. I suggest to put a good quality ground clamp on as soon as you get it and you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: mike d shull

customer_reviews.title: Read all reviews on this one
customer_reviews.text: Right out of box the torch had wrong threads to connect to machine,never get a second chance to make a first impression.called tech support mailbox full,bye bye junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Mello

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am super impressed with this unit. I am a hobby welder and perfect for that. I have cut up to 1/2" steel with it and a 1 1 /2" rod. Have to take your time but was shocked how well it did. If I did YouTube i would put it on.
customer_reviews.author: KIRK HANSEN

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this unit very long, but thus far it has performed well. I've cut 3/8" mild steel with no problems, cleanly. Not as fast as O/A, but much nicer cuts in 1/16" mild steel (and stainless... not an option with O/A). The unit arrived well packed and in good condition. It was actually smaller than I'd expected. It comes wired with a 220v.30A twist lock plug, so plan accordingly if you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Guy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk, cut only 2 “ on 1/8 material and it kicked a 20amp dedicated circuit.
customer_reviews.author: becenzee

customer_reviews.title: Good machine bad torch
customer_reviews.text: Great machine after I bought another torch for it. The first torch would not strike until you let the air stop. The pilot start did not work at all. Some times it would not start at the first time you would pull the trigger. Lotos was on help so I just took a gamble and ordered a new torch and it works great no problems. I guess that is how things happen now.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hollenstein

customer_reviews.title: Seems adequate for occasional use by novice metal worker\ homeowner.
customer_reviews.text: It works however it's a stretch to say it will cut half inch stock...maybe in more than 1 pass and certainly not clean. Works as advertised on thin stuff as a unit in this price range would be expected to. Just buy the hypertherm and b done with it.

I notified Customer support and the service was fast and great! I sent it back at there cost and received a new unit and I used it this weekend and so far so good, I am using this to put up steel pipe around my pasture. I would recommend this unit!!!!

customer_reviews.title: great plasma and customer support
customer_reviews.text: customer service was great. sent me out a extra part right away. will give a five star after a few month if all us still working good. . great out of the box, no problems. , really need to mess with your airflow at first to get good cuts until your used to its setting. . great plasma so far. .. UPDATE... still working great, no issues. highly recommend. get consumables through ZFE. much more affordable. 3rd UPDATE... still working☺

customer_reviews.title: Great Plasma Cutter
customer_reviews.text: This plasma cutter works great out of the box. Accurate, fast, and with clean cuts. My acetylene torch is going to hate it!
customer_reviews.author: Boss Hog

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I used it cut through 3/8 inch metal under 240V. Cutting speed is acceptable, The built-in air regulator and filter made my day. I used to have another plasma cutter, but I needed to install the air filter by myself, it took me half an hour to install it, and it would still have several small leaks in it. This one comes with a pre-installed air filter and regulator, and can easily connect to to my air compressor. No more leaking! The whole cutter can be set up within 5 mins!
customer_reviews.author: Xiaorui Weng

customer_reviews.title: The price
customer_reviews.text: I got this after watching a bunch of videos on it. It has been great performs better than i expect everyone that wants one and not sure for the money hands down great little machine. I have used the hell out of it and it cuts everything up to1/2inch on220 not sure on110 have not tried it on110.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This product never worked on 230 V. The replacement they sent me did not work on 110 V either. They did not test anything they sent me or anything I sent back to say why it malfunctioned. I had 218 V to the board and no light, no fire. They took 3 months to send a replacement and I had to pay for shipping. Poor customer service. Poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Big power for little money.
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived in good condition despite rough handling by the carrier. I was able to set it up and have it running the same day. It has worked very well and is surprisingly strong. I was able to easily cut through 5/8" thick steel bar, copper, aluminum, and 1/8" steel plate. The torch is easy to use and fits well in my hand.

customer_reviews.title: Better have backup cutter
customer_reviews.text: First time i tried to use it on my jeep, removing the lower control mounts, it stopped working. Fan wont even come on. Made sure it has power. Any idea? Havenot opened itup yet. It proubly hasa total of 10 minutes use.

customer_reviews.text: This plasma cutter is awesome. Using it rn to cut out side “walls” for 40’ HC WWT containers. Such a time saver. Can’t wait to really play with it.

customer_reviews.title: A MAY ZING !
customer_reviews.text: I dont normally do reviews , I was hopeful this would be a usable cutter , IT IS and then some 4 hours into this little power house and its non unstoppable right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use on 110v. Won’t arc .
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help in the restoration of a Mustang. Cuts fantastic on 220 V, tried using on 110 V would not strike an arc on 16 gauge sheet-metal very disappointed in that as I have limited 220 V plugs in my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Odell

customer_reviews.title: Nice Machine works great
customer_reviews.text: Only needed a basic machine for home use and this machine works great for that. I had a few questions on using the machine contacted customer service and they did an excellent job answering my questions and helping me with the machine. Works great and does what I need a home.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Finley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine, I have a full review including a tear down on Ytube
customer_reviews.text: If you go to You Tube and search "Trial n' error" you'll see a complete review including opening it up to look at the build quality. Great little plasma cutter and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Trial N' Error

customer_reviews.title: Fine for thinner material
customer_reviews.text: I did all the cutting on this stainless steel grill I built with this plasma cutter. It did the job. Thickest was 1/4" . Worked ok but a little more slag than the 3000.00 dollar machine does at work. I tried it on some 1/2" mild steel but it just wouldn't do it. All in all for the money it worked for me.

product_meta.title: Lotos LTP5000D 50Amp Non-Touch Pilot Arc Plasma Cutter, Dual Voltage 110V/220V, 1/2 Inch Clean Cut, Brown
product_meta.description:
About Lotos Technology
Headquartered in Sunnyvale, California, USA, Lotos Technology supplies quality welding and cutting tools to small businesses and Do-It-Yourself (DIY) buyers. Since 2007, our products have gained recognition as a reputable source for affordable industrial and consumer based portable plasma cutters and welders. We are proud of our product, quality and after-sale service. We offer quality welding and cutting tools to small businesses and DIY buyers. Our tools help you with your DIY projects to "Cut it, Weld it, Build it" to get the job done!
Our Technology
Lotos Technology employs latest technologies, such as IGBT/MOSFET based high frequency inverter technology, PWM (Pulse Width Modulation), etc. to deliver a consistent, and precise current to the cutting surface. It helps our customers easily achieve smooth, clean cuts on a wide range of surfaces and materials (e.g. Stainless Steel, Alloy Steel, Brass, Aluminum and other conductive materials) with less heat and reduced metal distortion. Our machines are capable of delivering rich features for most professional users as well as DIY users.
feature_bullets: ★ NON-TOUCH PILOT ARC PLASMA CUTTER: efficiently cuts though rough, painted, and rusty surfaces and produces minimal slag. Pilot arc technology allows you to cut without touching the tip to the metal. Better cutting quality and longer consumable life.
★ SAFE AND AT LOW COST: compact plasma cutter has a handle for portability and uses non-hazardous compressed air to cut stainless steel, alloy steel, mild steel, copper, and aluminum.

★ THE COMPATIBLE CONSUMABLES SETS for this BROWN Color LTP5000D Plasma Cutter are "PCS22" or "PCS33". Please search "Lotos PCS22" or "Lotos PCS33"; ★ NOT compatible with Lotos PCON40 or PCON90 Consumables Sets or any other third part consumables set

★ OUTPUT & PERFORMANCE: 10-50 A DC output, 1/2” ideal clean cut and 3/4” maximum severance cut under 220/240V. 10-35A DC output, 1/3" ideal clean cut and 2/5" maximum severance cut under 110/120V. SUITABLE CUTTING for Stainless Steel, Alloy Steel, Mild Steel, Copper, Aluminum, etc. Uses non-hazardous compressed air to cut, safe and at low cost.

★ SETUP WITHIN 1 MIN: The pre-installed NPT 1/4” industry type D plug and air filter regulator allows you to quick connect to your air compressor by using the stand coupler existing on your air compressor. The whole machine can be setup quickly within 1 min.
★ PAPST ADVANCED COOLING SYSTEM: ensure the plasma cutter have a stable and durable high performance. Rated Output (Volts): 100
★ DUAL VOLTAGE INPUT: Automatic Dual Voltage / Dual Frequency (110/120 V 220/240 V 50/60Hz).
★ PACKAGE INCLUDES: Power supply, Plasma cutting torch, ground clamp, Pre-installed NPT 1/4” industry type D plug and Air filter regulator, consumables, Instruction Manual, etc.
★ BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: We offer 30 days refund and 1-year , please submit registration form on our website.
50 Amp Digital Inverter Air Plasma Cutter
